definition: to transfer/to change trains, buses etc
see 轉文|转文[zhuai3 wen2]
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
four horse military chariot (archaic)/four (archaic)/generic term for history books
to ride/to mount/to make use of/to avail oneself of/to take advantage of/to multiply (math.)/Buddhist sect or creed
surname Cheng
old variant of 乘[cheng2]

sentences.english: In Los Angeles you need to take a connecting flight to New York.
sentences.chinese: 在洛杉矶您需要转乘中转联程航班到纽约。

sentences.english: Passengers may change to East Rail trains at Tai Wai.
sentences.chinese: 乘客可以在大围站转乘东铁列车。

sentences.english: Passenger may change there for MTR Tsuen Wan Line.
sentences.chinese: 乘客可在该站转乘地铁荃湾线。

sentences.english: Do you know where the transfer desk is?
sentences.chinese: 你知道转乘服务台在哪吗？

sentences.english: Depart for Manila. Upon arrival, meet and transferred to Puerto Galera by car and boat.
sentences.chinese: 出发前往马尼拉，抵达后转乘专车及船往酒店。

sentences.english: When you get on the transfer bus, just show the bus driver the ticket stub.
sentences.chinese: 当你上了转乘的公共汽车时，就把这张票根给司机看。

sentences.english: NO interchange discount with West Rail Line and Light Rail for route A73.
sentences.chinese: 线不设西铁线或轻铁转乘优惠。

sentences.english: You have to change to the No 6 bus at square.
sentences.chinese: 你得在广场转乘六路车。

sentences.english: Next stop is Siu Hong. Passengers for West Rail, please change there.
sentences.chinese: 下一站系兆康，乘客可在该站转乘西铁列车。

sentences.english: Passengers may change to MTR trains at Kowloon Tong .
sentences.chinese: 乘客可以在九龙塘站转乘地铁列车。

sentences.english: Can I make good connections for Washington there?
sentences.chinese: 我在那里可以转乘往华盛顿的列车吗？

sentences.english: Can I get a transfer to the No. 22 bus?
sentences.chinese: 我可以转乘到22路公共汽车吗？

sentences.english: Passenger may change there for Light Rail.
sentences.chinese: 乘客可在该站转乘轻铁。

sentences.english: Interchange station for Hang Hau or Po Lam.
sentences.chinese: 乘客可以转乘往坑口或宝琳列车。

sentences.english: Zhishan station, Citizen minibus 11, around 4 stops.
sentences.chinese: 淡水线芝山站下车，转乘市民小巴11，约4站即达。

sentences.english: When leaving the metro, you can get a stamp for a bus transfer.
sentences.chinese: 离开地铁时，会给您的票盖个章，用来转乘公交车。

definition: a turntable
to transfer/to change trains, buses etc
to change train (plane, bus etc)/transfer between modes of transport
through train (or bus)
to ride as a passenger/to travel by (car, plane etc)
long-distance coach
to ride (in a vehicle)
to go on a trip
terminus/final stop on rail or bus line
regular bus (service)
(of a bus, train etc) to leave for/heading for
shuttle bus ferrying passengers between train stations on two different rail lines
to ride (in a car or carriage)/to drive/to motor
terminus
long-distance bus/coach
bus stop/bus station
shuttle bus (or train)/train or bus traveling only part of its normal route
